description: This course covers the basics of Python, a versatile and beginner-friendly language. Learn about data types, control flow, functions, and object-oriented programming to start your coding journey.
Dive deep into Java, exploring advanced features like multithreading, generics, and Swing. This course is perfect for those who have a basic understanding of Java and want to level up their skills.

Master the art of web development using JavaScript. This course covers everything from basic syntax and data structures to complex topics like closures, async/await, and the Document Object Model (DOM).
Understand essential data structures using C++. Learn about arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs, and understand their implementation and application in real-world scenarios.

Explore machine learning concepts using R. This course covers various algorithms like regression, classification, clustering, and dimensionality reduction techniques. Prior knowledge of R is recommended.
Learn about the .NET framework from scratch. Understand how to build robust and scalable web applications using ASP.NET and C#. Basic knowledge of C# is beneficial but not mandatory.
Learn to build web applications with Ruby on Rails. This course covers MVC architecture, database migrations, routing, rendering views, and deploying to Heroku.
Develop iOS applications using Swift. Learn about Xcode, Interface Builder, Auto Layout, Core Data, Animation APIs, and submitting apps to the App Store
Learn to build Android applications using Kotlin. Understand Android Studio, Gradle, Activities & Life cycles, Intents & Broadcast Receivers, Services & Notifications.
